main event: A ground visual observation of an unidentified object reported by military and civilian sources on January 29, 1962, in South Carolina and Puerto Rico.
interesting points: The object was reported to emit a reddish-yellow light,At least 12 witnesses confirmed the sighting,The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes,The object moved straight and constant in the sky,The case was confirmed as a test related to AFWTR 119/1.
sighted object: an unidentified object emitting a reddish-yellow light
